name: Demon Slice
description:
Demon Slice:

This is a game where you play as a magician who is trying to kill as many demons as he can using his magic in a endless randomly generated dungeon. The game uses basic controlls such as WASD (moviment), Space (pause) and many other which you can find in the configs menu.

Credits:

Characters - 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii)

Enviroment - Pixel_Poem (https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck)

Coding - me :)
